    /* Reset básico */

    body {

      padding: 0 15px 40px;

    }

      margin: 30px 0 40px;

    h1 {
      color: #b30000;
      font-weight: 700;
      font-size: 2.8rem;
      letter-spacing: 0.08em;
      margin-bottom: 8px;
    }

    h2 {
      font-weight: 600;
      font-size: 1.3rem;
      letter-spacing: 0.08em;
      margin-top: 30px;
      margin-bottom: 18px;
      color: #b30000;
    }

    p.intro {
      text-align: center;
      max-width: 600px;
      margin: 0 auto 50px auto;
      font-size: 1rem;
      line-height: 1.5;
      color: #555;
    }

    /* Grid produtos */
    .products-grid {
      display: grid;
      grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
      gap: 20px;
      max-width: 960px;
      margin: 0 auto 30px;
    }

    .product-card {
      border: 2px solid #b30000;
      border-radius: 20px;
      padding: 20px;
      background: #fff;
      box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(179, 0, 0, 0.3);
      transition: box-shadow 0.3s ease;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      justify-content: space-between;
    }

    .product-card:hover {
      box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(179, 0, 0, 0.5);
    }

    .product-card img {
      width: 100%;
      border-radius: 16px;
      margin-bottom: 12px;
      object-fit: cover;
      height: 380px;
    }

    .product-card h3 {
      font-size: 1.3rem;
      font-weight: 700;
      letter-spacing: 0.05em;
      margin: 0 0 8px 0;
      color: #b30000;
    }

    .product-card span {
      font-weight: 700;
      color: #b30000;
      font-size: 1.2rem;
      margin-bottom: 15px;
      display: block;
    }

    .buy-button {
      font-weight: 700;
      background-color: #b30000;
      color: white;
      padding: 12px;
      border-radius: 12px;
      cursor: pointer;
      border: none;
      transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
    }

    .buy-button:hover {
      background-color: #800000;
    }

    /* Carrinho */
    #cart {
      position: fixed;
      top: 70px;
      right: 20px;
      width: 320px;
      max-width: 90vw;
      background: white;
      border: 2px solid #b30000;
      border-radius: 12px;
      box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(179, 0, 0, 0.3);
      padding: 15px;
      display: none;
      flex-direction: column;
      z-index: 10000;
    }

    #cart header {
      display: flex;
      justify-content: space-between;
      align-items: center;
      margin-bottom: 10px;
    }

    #cart header h2 {
      color: #b30000;
      margin: 0;
    }

    #close-cart {
      background: transparent;
      border: none;
      color: #b30000;
      font-size: 1.5rem;
      cursor: pointer;
      font-weight: 700;
      line-height: 1;
    }

    #cart-items {
      max-height: 250px;
      overflow-y: auto;
      margin-bottom: 10px;
    }

    .cart-item {
      display: flex;
      justify-content: space-between;
      margin-bottom: 8px;
    }

    .cart-item span {
      flex-grow: 1;
      white-space: nowrap;
      overflow: hidden;
      text-overflow: ellipsis;
    }

    .remove-item {
      color: #b30000;
      cursor: pointer;
      font-weight: 700;
      margin-left: 10px;
      user-select: none;
    }

    #cart-total {
      font-weight: 700;
      font-size: 1.2rem;
      margin-bottom: 10px;
      text-align: right;
    }

    #checkout-btn {
      background-color: #b30000;
      color: white;
      padding: 12px;
      border: none;
      border-radius: 8px;
      cursor: pointer;
      font-weight: 700;
      font-size: 1rem;
    }

    #checkout-btn:disabled {
      background-color: #ccc;
      cursor: not-allowed;
    }

    /* Modal de pagamento */
    #payment-modal {
      position: fixed;
      top: 0;
      left: 0;
      right: 0;
      bottom: 0;
      background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
      display: none;
      justify-content: center;
      align-items: center;
      z-index: 11000;
    }

    #payment-modal[aria-hidden="false"] {
      display: flex;
    }

    .modal-content {
      background: white;
      border-radius: 12px;
      width: 350px;
      max-width: 90vw;
      padding: 20px;
      box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(179, 0, 0, 0.5);
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
    }

    .modal-content header {
      display: flex;
      justify-content: space-between;
      align-items: center;
      margin-bottom: 15px;
    }

    .modal-content header h2 {
      margin: 0;
      color: #b30000;
    }

    #close-payment {
      background: transparent;
      border: none;
      color: #b30000;
      font-size: 1.5rem;
      cursor: pointer;
      font-weight: 700;
      line-height: 1;
    }

    .payment-options {
      display: flex;
      gap: 15px;
      margin-bottom: 15px;
    }

    .payment-options button {
      flex: 1;
      padding: 12px 0;
      font-weight: 700;
      border-radius: 8px;
      border: 2px solid #b30000;
      cursor: pointer;
      background: white;
      color: #b30000;
      transition: background-color 0.3s ease, color 0.3s ease;
    }

    .payment-options button.selected,
    .payment-options button:hover {
      background-color: #b30000;
      color: white;
    }

    #payment-info {
      min-height: 80px;
      margin-bottom: 15px;
      font-size: 0.9rem;
      color: #333;
      white-space: pre-wrap;
      overflow-wrap: break-word;
    }

    #confirm-payment {
      background-color: #b30000;
      color: white;
      padding: 12px;
      border: none;
      border-radius: 8px;
      cursor: pointer;
      font-weight: 700;
      font-size: 1rem;
    }

    #confirm-payment:disabled {
      background-color: #ccc;
      cursor: not-allowed;
    }

    /* Scroll bar para o carrinho */
    #cart-items::-webkit-scrollbar {
      width: 6px;
    }

    #cart-items::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
      background-color: #b30000;
      border-radius: 3px;
    }

    /* Mobile */
    @media (max-width: 600px) {
      #cart {
        top: auto;
        bottom: 10px;
        right: 10px;
        width: 90vw;
      }

      .modal-content {
        width: 90vw;
      }
    }
  </style>

  <main>

  <!-- Carrinho -->
  <div id="cart" aria-live="polite" aria-label="Carrinho de compras">
    <header>
      <h2>Carrinho</h2>
      <button id="close-cart" aria-label="Fechar carrinho">&times;</button>
    </header>
    <div id="cart-items"></div>
    <div id="cart-total">Total: R$ 0,00</div>
    <button id="checkout-btn" disabled>Finalizar Compra</button>
  </div>

  <!-- Modal de Pagamento -->
  <div id="payment-modal" aria-hidden="true" role="dialog" aria-labelledby="payment-title">
    <div class="modal-content">
      <header>
        <h2 id="payment-title">Escolha o método de pagamento</h2>
        <button id="close-payment" aria-label="Fechar pagamento">&times;</button>
      </header>
      <div class="payment-options">
        <button id="pix-btn" type="button">PIX</button>
        <button id="card-btn" type="button">Cartão de Crédito</button>
      </div>
      <div id="payment-info" aria-live="polite"></div>
      <button id="confirm-payment" disabled>Confirmar Pagamento</button>
    </div>
  </div>

  <script>
    // Seleciona todos os produtos
    const productCards = document.querySelectorAll(".product-card");
    const cart = [];
    const cartEl = document.getElementById("cart");
    const cartItemsEl = document.getElementById("cart-items");
    const cartTotalEl = document.getElementById("cart-total");
    const checkoutBtn = document.getElementById("checkout-btn");
    const closeCartBtn = document.getElementById("close-cart");

    const paymentModal = document.getElementById("payment-modal");
    const closePaymentBtn = document.getElementById("close-payment");
    const pixBtn = document.getElementById("pix-btn");
    const cardBtn = document.getElementById("card-btn");
    const paymentInfoEl = document.getElementById("payment-info");
    const confirmPaymentBtn = document.getElementById("confirm-payment");

    // Função para formatar preço
    function formatPrice(price) {
      return price.toLocaleString("pt-BR", {
        style: "currency",
        currency: "BRL",
      });
    }

    // Converte string preço para número (ex: "R$ 129,90" -> 129.9)
    function parsePrice(priceStr) {
      return Number(priceStr.replace(/[^\d,]/g, "").replace(",", "."));
    }

    // Atualiza a exibição do carrinho
    function updateCartDisplay() {
      if (cart.length === 0) {
        cartItemsEl.innerHTML = "<p>Carrinho vazio.</p>";
        cartTotalEl.textContent = "Total: R$ 0,00";
        checkoutBtn.disabled = true;
        return;
      }

      checkoutBtn.disabled = false;

      cartItemsEl.innerHTML = "";
      let total = 0;
      cart.forEach((item, index) => {
        total += item.price * item.quantity;

        const itemEl = document.createElement("div");
        itemEl.classList.add("cart-item");

        const nameSpan = document.createElement("span");
        nameSpan.textContent = `${item.name} x${item.quantity}`;
        itemEl.appendChild(nameSpan);

        const priceSpan = document.createElement("span");
        priceSpan.textContent = formatPrice(item.price * item.quantity);
        priceSpan.style.marginLeft = "10px";
        itemEl.appendChild(priceSpan);

        const removeBtn = document.createElement("button");
        removeBtn.textContent = "x";
        removeBtn.classList.add("remove-item");
        removeBtn.setAttribute("aria-label", `Remover ${item.name} do carrinho`);
        removeBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
          removeFromCart(index);
        });
        itemEl.appendChild(removeBtn);

        cartItemsEl.appendChild(itemEl);
      });

      cartTotalEl.textContent = `Total: ${formatPrice(total)}`;
    }

    // Adiciona produto ao carrinho
    function addToCart(name, price) {
      // Se já existe, só aumenta quantidade
      const existingIndex = cart.findIndex((item) => item.name === name);
      if (existingIndex > -1) {
        cart[existingIndex].quantity++;
      } else {
        cart.push({ name, price, quantity: 1 });
      }
      updateCartDisplay();
      showCart();
    }

    // Remove item do carrinho pelo índice
    function removeFromCart(index) {
      cart.splice(index, 1);
      updateCartDisplay();
      if (cart.length === 0) {
        hideCart();
      }
    }

    // Mostrar e esconder carrinho
    function showCart() {
      cartEl.style.display = "flex";
    }

    function hideCart() {
      cartEl.style.display = "none";
    }

    closeCartBtn.addEventListener("click", hideCart);

    // Vincular botões Comprar
    productCards.forEach((card) => {
      const btn = card.querySelector(".buy-button");
      const name = card.querySelector("h3").textContent.trim();
      const priceText = card.querySelector("span").textContent.trim();
      const price = parsePrice(priceText);

      btn.addEventListener("click", () => {
        addToCart(name, price);
      });
    });

    // Checkout
    checkoutBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
      openPaymentModal();
    });

    // Modal Pagamento
    function openPaymentModal() {
      paymentModal.setAttribute("aria-hidden", "false");
      paymentInfoEl.textContent = "";
      confirmPaymentBtn.disabled = true;
      selectedPayment = null;
      pixBtn.classList.remove("selected");
      cardBtn.classList.remove("selected");
    }

    function closePaymentModal() {
      paymentModal.setAttribute("aria-hidden", "true");
    }

    closePaymentBtn.addEventListener("click", closePaymentModal);

    // Seleção de pagamento
    let selectedPayment = null;

    pixBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
      selectedPayment = "PIX";
      pixBtn.classList.add("selected");
      cardBtn.classList.remove("selected");
      paymentInfoEl.textContent = `Para pagar via PIX, envie o valor total para o seguinte QR Code ou chave:\n\nChave PIX: adegasantos@pix.com.br\n\n[QR Code fictício aqui]`;
      confirmPaymentBtn.disabled = false;
    });

    cardBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
      selectedPayment = "Cartão";
      cardBtn.classList.add("selected");
      pixBtn.classList.remove("selected");
      paymentInfoEl.textContent =
        "Você será redirecionado para a página segura de pagamento com cartão.\n\nApós o pagamento, seu pedido será processado.";
      confirmPaymentBtn.disabled = false;
    });

    // Confirmar pagamento
    confirmPaymentBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
      if (!selectedPayment) return;

      alert(
        `Pagamento via ${selectedPayment} confirmado!\n\nObrigado pela compra.`
      );

      // Limpa carrinho e fecha tudo
      cart.length = 0;
      updateCartDisplay();
      hideCart();
      closePaymentModal();
    });
  </script>
</body>

</html>
